mapper.insert: insert into order(shipNum, username, cartNum, paymentType, itemsPrice, shippingFee, payment, shippingMemo, orderDate, status, productNum, name, email, phone) values (#{shipNum}, #{username}, #{cartNum}, #{paymentType}, #{itemsPrice}, #{shippingFee}, #{payment}, #{shippingMemo}, #{orderDate}, #{status}, #{productNum}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone})
